titles: The information of Thomas Dangerfield, Gent. delivered at the bar of the Hovse of Commons, Tuesday the twentieth day of October in the year of Our Lord 1680 / perused and signed to be printed according to the order of the House of Commons by me William Williams ...
author: Dangerfield, Thomas, 1650?-1685.
Williams, William, Sir, 1634-1700.

publisher: Printed by the assigns of John Bill, Thomas Newcomb, and Henry Hills ...,
